website_summaries.verdict: You'll ride adorably with this dog basket that features a leash clip to keep your buddy secure.
pros: The perfect option for owners of intrepid small dogs (it has a capacity of 10 lbs.)
Features storage pockets and is stable when installed properly
The bottom is firm and machine washable
cons: Take it for a test ride before putting your dog in it
The strap inside the basket could be of better material and is a bit long

customer_reviews.title: Not good for dogs over 6 lbs - No bottom bracket is included.
customer_reviews.text: Basket tilts downward since there is no brace included for the bottom of the basket. Would not buy again. Overall the product is okay. The interior clasp is too long, and was difficult to install (doesn't fit) on the handlebars of a 26" bicycle. I have a 7lb Chihuahua mix, and she barely fits and ended up jumping out of the basket. Unable to use the item due to these issues. The purchase was a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: It is very sturdy - attaches easily to our bike(s) and our 10 ...
customer_reviews.text: This came and was exactly what we hoped we had ordered. It is very sturdy - attaches easily to our bike(s) and our 10 pound poodle is safe and loves to ride in it. It comes with a clasp for your dogs harness or collar, to keep your dog secure. I would definitely recommend it to anyone looking for a small animal basket for a bike!
customer_reviews.author: J Corcoran

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Needs some tweaking
customer_reviews.text: Our shorkie loves to ride in her basket. Pros Dog loves it Easy to install Feels of good quality Cons Tether needs to be shorter (we safety pinned ours) Tether clip is cheap (replaced ours with a small d-ring) I'd buy again but would encourage the manufacturer to improve the tethering system.
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and comfy and stayed really stable on my bike.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: It fits my 15-lb JRT, though having to sit in it sideways, she seems conformable , would like it a bit bigger, so she would have a little more room. Overall, we are happy with the product - good quality and style, besides, it matches my bike nicely!
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: I purchased the bar underneath and it was a waste. My poodle is 13lbs and the basket stays ...
customer_reviews.text: This basket stays up without anything holding it up. Based on the reviews, I purchased the bar underneath and it was a waste. My poodle is 13lbs and the basket stays put perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: BETH TAYLOR

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My dog LOVES this! It's very sturdy, high quality. She's 10 lbs and short haired, so not a lot of fluff to her and she has plenty of room to curl up in this. The bottom is soft and fuzzy and she just rides like a champ in it. It attaches with heavy velcro and snap straps, so it was super easy to attach to my bike and I don't have any worries about it moving during the ride, even when she stands up. There's a shoulder strap so it could double as a carrier and the carrying case is nice too.
customer_reviews.author: mathspan

customer_reviews.title: It's great! Warning though that it is really small
customer_reviews.text: It's great! Warning though that it is really small. I got it for a 4 lb puppy. Now that she is closer to 10 lb she can't lay down in it. She still loves it and dives into it when it is sitting at home. I think I'll need to get something else for her as an adult, but still no regrets about buying this to get me through the undervaccinated puppy stage!
customer_reviews.author: A. Ward

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Small Dogs
customer_reviews.text: This produce is amazing! It set up easily and strapped on well to my bike. My dog enjoyed it even though he got motion sickness. It has a safety clip on the inside that you can attach to a dog's collar or harness (I recommend harness since it's short). It makes the animal and owner feel safe and it has storage space for dog treats. Not really a place for water if you take large water bottles with you, small ones would fit in the expandable side pouches. The interior of the crate is soft and easy to assemble and disassemble.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Foote

customer_reviews.title: Good Fit for a Medium 29” wheel MTB and very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I have a Mountain Bike, size M with 29” wheels. At first I was concerned that the wheels would touch the basket, to my Suprise the clearance is perfect. When I unpacked it from the package I thought, “how will this attach to the bike” as I saw no clamps but just some straps. I wasn’t sure how secure it was going to be. Once I fitted it onto the bike I was very amazed at how secure and sturdy it was. My only concern is that it may come apart in the future because the strap that’s connected to the basket seems to already be worn out
customer_reviews.author: Sabir Miah

customer_reviews.title: Cute basket, front sags on my bike
customer_reviews.text: Love this basket - I have a 9lb miniature dachshund and she fits perfectly. My only complaint is that it is kind of hard to fit on my bike’s handlebars and it sometimes falls down in the front - it never touches my wheels but it definitely sags about 1/2” away. The pockets are great though and the basket is well-crafted. I’ve also used it just as a shoulder bag to carry my dog and it works great for that too!
customer_reviews.author: Livia Songster

customer_reviews.title: Great bike carrier for our littlest adventurers.
customer_reviews.text: My little papillon loves this bike carrier! And she’s afraid of everything. Hates being in the car, for example, but loves this. Go figure. I guess she just loves the breeze in her adorable ears. I’m giving the review 4 stars rather than five only because my lil one tried to jump out when I rang the bike bell. [she’s afraid of that too!] luckily the strap held and she was in a harness so no injury, but scary. I may need a tweak. But my gal loves this so, will adjust as necessary for her.
customer_reviews.author: Adelina Cavanagh

customer_reviews.title: I use this with my 12 pound Havanese on my ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this with my 12 pound Havanese on my bike handle and I also hook the strap around the head rest in the car so he can be higher up to see.
customer_reviews.author: Momma Bikes

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Fun
customer_reviews.text: We attached this to my bike as soon as we got it and took our puppy for a ride. The only criticism I'd give is that the lead for the latch is a bit long and without the top string tightened enough, my little puppy was almost able to make it out but I luckily caught her. Just need to be more careful to make sure the top string is tightened. I was wondering if this could also function as a car seat.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Nice basket, my dog is the main problem
customer_reviews.text: Nice sturdy basket and works well. If only my dog was calm enough to not jump out.... It could probably use a shorter security leash. She hopped out in the middle of a ride and dangled off the side like a pinata. I had the security leash set on it's shortest too. Luckily she got out of that ordeal safe, but she's not going out on rides with me anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: My little yorkie loves going for bikes rides in her little basket. It has the leash attached inside to keep her from jumping out, plus the top closes up around her. My only complaint is putting it on and taking it off. The straps are a hassle and I do wish I could use this on a permanent bike attachment to hook on and off. Other than that, it's great!
customer_reviews.author: beck

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: 7 lb toy poodle fits. He gets a little scared on the ride. Stability is pretty good, but you have to crank down on the screws and add bungie cords just to feel safer. It does the trick but it is bulky and at times feels unstable in its attachment to the bar. I would not put a dog much bigger than 7lbs in here.
customer_reviews.author: Katie P

customer_reviews.title: Not too stable
customer_reviews.text: The carrier is attached to the bike by straps which makes it not too stable. It also would lower and hit my tire. I purchased a bag instead that came with his own metal bracket to attach it to the bike.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this basket and so does my dog
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this basket and so does my dog! It does rest on top of the fender and occasionally causes rubbing on the tire, but it is easily fixed.
customer_reviews.author: hulio

customer_reviews.title: Find another one please
customer_reviews.text: One of the straps broke after our 3rd ride with our pet (small Pomeranian).... waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Manuel Alejandro Bejarano

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy basket, needs longer strap for the bar on the bike.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this dog basket however, the Velcro strap does not fully stretch around the bar on my bike. I improvised by using a knee brace, ha ha. Also, my dog can and will jump out. I have yet to figure out how to safely keep her in without hanging from the strap inside the basket.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel E. Filar

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, the dog and I both love it. I throw a treat or two in the bottom at the start of every ride so she looks forward to her journey and gets excited when she sees me putting on my bike helmet. She's about 5 lbs, she is very comfortable sitting up and looking out or lying down...I have a little towel for extra padding. It has been a fun summer for both of us thanks to this basket!
customer_reviews.author: maod

customer_reviews.title: Cute basket for dogs
customer_reviews.text: It's so cute. Just a heads up... if you have a lot of lights and phone case holders and bells on the front of your bike.. might get in the way when you put this basket in the front.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Pretty impressed
customer_reviews.text: First impression Awesome, very well built and very sturdy put it on our Trek Dual sport fits fine the design allows for adjusting the fit see pictures I will update after a couple of rides. Stay tuned, Alex Cigarbundlesofmiami
customer_reviews.author: cigarbundlesofmiami

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 10-pound dog
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this basket for 3 years, and it has held up very well. My 10-pound Maltese mix just LOVES to go for bike rides. He quickly figured out that he is restrained (with the little clip-on leash) while in the basket and does not try to jump out - even when an evil squirrel crosses his path! We get lots of compliments everywhere we ride.
customer_reviews.author: V. Burke

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: At first a little concerned as the description of assembly seemed inadequate, but my mistake and after finding the instructions it went together very well. The product is very well made and works great for our little Maltese at 8 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Wood Doc

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves it
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this product my dog fits in it perfectly and has plenty of room I don't wear it over my shoulder seems too big for that but on the bike it's great
customer_reviews.author: pjclick

customer_reviews.title: Awesome basket! Very sturdy and safe!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best money I've ever spent!! My dog is a 17 lb terrier mix and the basket is a perfect size for him and he loves it! It securely holds him and I don't worry at all about it falling or coming apart. It is very safe and I highly recommend this! Great product
customer_reviews.author: Fallon McCranie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works excellent. My dog is 17.5lb havanese and fits in it great.
customer_reviews.author: jocelyn m.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I’m having so much fun taking my dog with me on rides. This is such a nice basket with extra pockets. My dog is 7 pounds and he fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Trigilio

customer_reviews.title: Works on any bike.
customer_reviews.text: I got an electric bike that has strange handlebars. Their diameter changes and the electric controls and stuff get in the way, This thing is sturdy and fits easily.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Drex

customer_reviews.title: Damaged and Incomplete
customer_reviews.text: It arrived missing some of the straps, had no instructions on how to attach it (it's not always as "intuitive" as manufacturers think), and damaged although the box was in perfect condition. I think it was a reshipped, return.
customer_reviews.author: Crankyolebroad

customer_reviews.title: Great basket for my dog
customer_reviews.text: I have a 10lb Maltese that we now bring with us when we ride our bikes. She sit in and looks at everyone and scouts the scenery. There is a safety harness that attaches to her collar. Plenty of room. Pockets to store snacks, keys, etc. Easy to install but not perfect for every bike so be aware of this aspect. Decent price.
customer_reviews.author: Yo-Mamma

customer_reviews.title: I was able secure it to my brake cords without interfering with their functionality (it would be nice if the Velcro were longer though)
customer_reviews.text: The basket fit on my hybrid bike using the side buckles/straps attached to my handles bars. Although the back Velcro strap was not long enough to attach to the base on the handle bars, I was able secure it to my brake cords without interfering with their functionality (it would be nice if the Velcro were longer though). The mesh protective cover was great for my dog to peek out the entire ride.
customer_reviews.author: simpson22

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: My 8.5 lb chihuahua fit perfectly. I used it on my Trek FXS6 2018.
customer_reviews.author: Arianna Fine

customer_reviews.title: super
customer_reviews.text: Works great and we also strapped in between the front car seat sideways as our little dog cried when she was strapped in the back seat. Now she can see out the front window and has our devoted attention. The tie down clip is small so I added a larger one. Sturdy and will not collapse like other we looked at.
customer_reviews.author: S. Kingel

customer_reviews.title: Secure Ride
customer_reviews.text: This basket was very easy to attach to my bike. It only took a few minutes. My dog is 8 pounds, and the basket carries her weight easily. The bottom is firm. It feels very solid and secure. I like the pockets so I can carry my phone, keys, snacks etc.
customer_reviews.author: B Drew

customer_reviews.title: Well made but very tall
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Very well made. But measure your height from handlebar to wheel. It is very tall and I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Steve RB

customer_reviews.title: Better than the picture
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome and the picture does not show all of the benefits. Our dog loves to ride in it and the way the top gathers around her neck she won't jump out. it is very stable on the bike
customer_reviews.author: John Relph

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Our 7lb Maltipoo fits perfectly with just enough room to spare. The basket easily and safely attaches to the bike with the 2 clip-on side straps. My only issue is the center velcro strap. This strap is too short to reach the center bar so we added our own longer version. We also added a clip to attach his collar to the basket to ensure he doesn't try to jump out. We've tried others and this is the best by far!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves riding in this, doesn’t freak him ...
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves riding in this, doesn’t freak him out at all. He is a chihuahua Jack Russell mix weighs 15 Lbs. I shortened the leash in the basket and I have where only his head is out.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this basket!
customer_reviews.text: We love it! Very easy to instal and stays snuggly on the bike. Our dog really enjoys riding in the basket and we know she is safe. The internal leash and draw string helped to train her to stay inside the basket.
customer_reviews.author: Elisa C.

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I was afraid my little dog would be too excited and try to jump out. But there is a leash that is adjustable an the covering around the top keeps him back and from trying to jump. He loves it. He just enjoys the ride!
customer_reviews.author: laurs books

customer_reviews.title: Great carrier
customer_reviews.text: A very nice carrier ! Fits both of our hybrid street bikes. Has lots of storage, internal leash clip, pull-string top to keep fido warm on cool days. Couldn't be better !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves going on bike rides with us. ...
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves going on bike rides with us. She gets lots of attention when riding in her basket. We ride to the dog park. It fits securely on my bike. She loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Nelle9182

customer_reviews.title: This is awesome and I can use it in my car as ...
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome and I can use it in my car as a car seat by putting the shoulder strap around the headrest of my passenger seat.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: does the job
customer_reviews.text: Easy off and own, good for pet or use as front utility basket, keep it dry.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Scott

customer_reviews.title: Solid carrier
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid basket for a small dog. The safety leash is a little weak but my dog isn’t a jumper. There’s not a lot of clearance between the tire and carrier but it doesn’t sag when he’s in it. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice with excellent build quality, even included a case. Attaches to bike easily and quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Ernie Franco

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Works awesome! Our dog is an 11 lb. morkie. The clip inside for her collar is necessary and perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Kel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My mini schnauzer loves it so therefore i love it.
customer_reviews.author: Luvlife

customer_reviews.title: We love it !!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Piccolino is the happiest dog in this bag! We had to buy him a pair of goggles because the wind is too hard on his eyes but he fits perfectly and he sits paciently and enjoys the bike ride!! We love to bring him wherever we go!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great small dog bike basket
customer_reviews.text: My 6 lb shorkie seems to love it! She gets to see the neighborhood from a higher view and she loves to put her head out like she does with the car window. She can’t face forward though as it’s not long enough. U bought the support frame. I don’t think it’s needed. I prefer it without. I just have to remove it now.
customer_reviews.author: Janine Masiewicz

customer_reviews.title: DANGEROUS
customer_reviews.text: The basket kept lowering until the basket was rubbing against the tire. It’s DANGEROUS and I do NOT recommend it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Seon Hee Suh

customer_reviews.title: I have a ~10 pound mix and he loved this! There is a leash on the inside ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a ~10 pound mix and he loved this! There is a leash on the inside so you can clip your dog to avoid them jumping out. I would also like to mention that my bike is more of a mountain bike, so when I hit bumps my shocks kick in and the bottom of the basket rubs the tire. However, I don't plan to do much off-road riding!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable inner walls
customer_reviews.text: Great basket! Very durable inner walls! My Shiba puppy is more than happy to go for a walk in it
customer_reviews.author: Eugene

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect to take my small dog biking. Fits on generic bike. Snug on frame.
customer_reviews.author: C Panai

customer_reviews.title: Loving my dog Bike Bag!
customer_reviews.text: I am loving my new dog bike bag, my pom looks comfortable and it attaches very easy.
customer_reviews.author: cynthia buynak

customer_reviews.title: Loved this product
customer_reviews.text: Receive the product fast. My dog loves it. Well made, sturdy and secure for my dog!!! Recommend it to anyone looking for one.
customer_reviews.author: Cora Murray

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: My dog is a 14 lb. Morkie. He has to sit in it sideways but overall it's made well and it holds him in while we're riding. I'm happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: L P

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Item was delivered with "poop" stain and dog clasp was broken. Very cute basket besides that.
customer_reviews.author: Angelea Saetang

customer_reviews.title: Love this cute pet carrier for my bike!
customer_reviews.text: Love this pet carrier for my bike! Very well made and sturdy. My 10 year old 15lb. Jack Russell Maxx loves now being able to join in on the family bike ride trips!
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: I wish the attachments for the basket worked better with the 10 speed bike handle bars but other ...
customer_reviews.text: I wish the attachments for the basket worked better with the 10 speed bike handle bars but other than that I love it.
customer_reviews.author: jodi

customer_reviews.title: The dog will bite through the drawstring with easy ease.
customer_reviews.text: The dog will bite through the drawstring with easy ease.
customer_reviews.author: CBASS0026

customer_reviews.title: Great value and the dog loves it
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. Great value and the dog loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Maximus Prime

customer_reviews.title: Our Pom Loves It!
customer_reviews.text: Our Pom is nine pounds. She fits in it well. She seems very secure. She has never yet tried to get out, either because she's enjoying the ride so much or because she can't figure out how she can get her paws up and out since it cinches around her neck. Good construction, looks just like on the picture, nice pockets. The only problem we had, which was a small one, was due to the way my husband's bike is, we needed a longer Velcro strap to help with securing it to the bike. Got one at Home Depot. Otherwise, all good so far.
customer_reviews.author: C. MacIntyre

customer_reviews.title: We Love It!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Exactly what I wanted so my little traveling boy could ride with me. He loves to go! It doesn't matter if it's in the car or on the bike. (He weighs about 6 pounds).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pomeranian freedom
customer_reviews.text: My Pomeranian loves it she gets excited every time she sees it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Check out my Shih Tzu wanting to hang his feet out
customer_reviews.text: Meant for up to 15 pounds. My Shih Tzu is 14-1/2 lbs. see how he wants to ride. I put him back inside and draw the string and he is tethered in by his harness. But I'm pretty nervous about the setup. That aside, this product is high quality. I love the case for it as well. Probably better for shorter dogs, like Yorkies.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa E.

customer_reviews.title: Love this basket
customer_reviews.text: Love this basket. It’s very functional and works perfectly! I’ve gotten lots of compliments on this basket. My dog fits great and has room to get cozy. It’s safe and sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Mallory

customer_reviews.title: Takes less than a minute  to mount or remove
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my neighbor. Very easy to mount to bike. Dog sits in it and loves to go on rides. Perfect for small dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Allen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality!!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, easy to hook onto the bike, we just love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it & more important: Tinker Bell loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Ptaszynski

customer_reviews.title: My chwawwah loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Good solid construction, well thought out layout slight problem with fitting it to my mobility scooter very good buy.
customer_reviews.author: cyril moyle

customer_reviews.title: quality materials and perfect for my Chihuahua
customer_reviews.text: Very well made; quality materials and perfect for my Chihuahua.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Its built well, but didnt fit on any of my 4 bikes
customer_reviews.author: Ming

customer_reviews.title: it finally became nice enough to use it so we took it out ...
customer_reviews.text: Came with very vague instructions so wasn't able to install it to our bike. Also if you have gears or anything it won't seemingly work. Of course, my fault, it finally became nice enough to use it so we took it out and I now missed the return date by a week so I am stuck with it. I don't recommend unless you have used one before and know how to install it.
customer_reviews.author: Donna B.

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Was not secure and my 10 lbs dog was shaking. Not recommended to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: dawn

product_meta.title: Petsfit Safety Dog Bike Basket for Small Dogs and Good for All Bikes
product_meta.description: Basic Information: Material: Oxford Cloth Dimension: 15.8 x 12.8 x 9.1 inch Color: Green and Grey Note: All material is no harm to pets. Designs and Functions: 1. Ensuring stability by reinforced frame. 2. Includes mesh pocket for water bottle & elastic mesh cover for top of carrier to zip pet in. 3. Superior oxford material provides utmost support and long lasting use. 4. Built-in adjustable straps make for installation in almost any vehicle a breeze. 5. Converts from bike basket to carrier with no further assembly. 6. Several mesh ensure good ventilation for pets. 7. It can be easily removed from your bike and includes a padded strap so you can also carry it on your shoulder. 8. This bike basket provides a safe and comfortable place for your pet to enjoy the journey while biking. Warranty: 1. Petsfit adhere to Return Policy. 2. Within 30 days, any quality problems, we will take full responsibility. 3. Attention: Please kindly check the size before buying.
feature_bullets: Safety leash and drawstring mesh top secures pet inside during moving; Solid bottom prevent pets from sliding down and no metal support required
Mesh top allows air flow and won’t be hot and humid in summer; High visibility reflective strip on bike seat reminds others
The basket easily disconnects from the bike in seconds and can be used as a pet carrier
Double use mat: plush side for winter and nylon for summer; Mat is removable for easy cleaning
Side pockets can store goods like leash clip and treats; Flat for easy storage when not use

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
